sub_title: Strategic Account Executive Benelux at Celonis
summary:
I am commercial, positive can-do mentality, result-focused, internationally-orientated, and a highly ambitious personality with a passion for technology (Personal MBTI Profile: ENTJ).

Due to my educational background (Master degree) in Business Administration, and as a founder of a technology driven start-up and having 5 years experience at Microsoft (started in the Sales Traineeship), I am able to translate IT into customer solutions to achieve business value.
 
Currently performing a Strategic Account Executive role at Celonis, a scale-up specialized in process mining and execution management, to unlock value in business processes.

On a personal level: I like to play soccer (former member of Dutch National Paralympic Soccer Team), travel, enjoy good restaurants, and give lectures about diversity & inclusion.

Specialities: new business development (lead generation & qualification), industry based solution selling, social selling (Linkedin Sales Navigator), business applications (CRM, ERP and low-code), Enterprise Sales, Cloud Sales B2B, Account Management, Deal Closing.

awards.title: Microsoft: Gold Club Award
awards.description: Gold Club Award for accelerating hyper growth of business applications, above $10M in fiscal year.

awards.title: Microsoft: Western Europe Champion Award: Big Deal achievement
awards.description: Champion Award for closing the biggest business application deal in the Netherlands that fiscal year.

awards.title: Microsoft: Gold Club Award
awards.description: Gold Club Award achieved for building the Public Sector business from scratch, overscoring quota.

awards.title: Microsoft: Western Europe Champion Award: Compete with Growth Mindset
awards.description: In my 2nd year at Microsoft, as MACH trainee, I was rewarded with a Champion Award for implementing a Dynamics 365 new business development plan in which we leverage data-driven analysis, social selling and the scalability of our partner network.

awards.title: Microsoft: Top Talent Status
awards.description: After my first year at Microsoft as a MACH trainee, with an inside sales role for the Enterprise Segment, I was rewarded by Senior Leadership Team with Top Talent Status. Achieved by reaching a new business record, and implementing a new marketing model.

awards.title: Business Walk of Fame 2017: 3rd place
awards.description:
The Business Walk of Fame is an initiative of the Lucile Werner Foundation, this event allows enterprise companies to give a lecture about diversity & inclusion. On behalf of Microsoft, I received the 3rd price.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-UFoZ8Jgik8

certifications.name: Microsoft - INSEAD Online Business Strategy and Financial Acumen

profile_positions.description:
Celonis is the market leader in AI-enhanced Process Mining and Process Excellence. Celonis helps companies in every industry remove friction from critical business processes and improve execution. The system knows how processes really run, senses friction in real time, and acts with intelligent automation and recommendations. Companies around the world, including Siemens, Uber, Citi, Coca-Cola, and Vodafone, have harnessed the power of Celonis to drive execution and outcomes, generating millions of dollars in value.

- Responsible for high value Strategic accounts in the Commercial Enterprise segment for the Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg (Benelux)
- Leading the Go To Market strategy and Execution
profile_positions.title: Strategic Account Executive Benelux

profile_positions.description:
The ubiquity of modern technology is causing a shift in societal behavior. Citizens expect their governments to adapt to the ways in which commercial or for-profit companies interact with their customers: on their own terms with rapid, easy-to-use services. In this role I help Dutch Public Sector organizations with their digital transformation through business applications, in the following industries: Government, Healthcare and Education.

Responsibilities:
- Solution selling 
- Partner engagement (SI's and ISV's with industry-specific differentiating proposition)

Awards and achievements:
+ Gold Club Award
+ Champion Award
+ Attainments of 3 FY's: 124%, 214%, 162%
profile_positions.title: Solution Specialist Business Applications (Dynamics 365 & Power Platform) - Enterprise Public Sector

profile_positions.description:
In this role I help Enterprise companies in the Netherlands to turn relationships into revenue, and transform their sellers into digital (social) sellers. Together with customers I challenge them on their current AS-IS situation of doing marketing & sales, and help them to transform to a TO-BE situation of modern selling, enabled by technological innovations. The Microsoft Relationship Sales proposition leverages the intelligence of the Dynamics 365 platform capabilities (business applications), combined with the power of network of LinkedIn Sales Navigator!

In this role I am responsible for:
- Presenting and proving the technical capabilities of Dynamics 365 and LinkedIn Sales Navigator
- Translating features and functions into business value outcomes for the customer (quantifying the benefits)

Learn more about Microsoft Relationship Sales: http://aka.ms/microsoftrelationshipsales

Awards and achievements:
+ Gold Club Award
+ Attainment 124%
profile_positions.title: Tech Value Specialist - Microsoft Relationship Sales (Dynamics 365 & Linkedin Sales Navigator)

profile_positions.description:
Built on the intelligent cloud, Dynamics 365 breaks down the CRM and ERP silo, and brings together the best of Microsoft's technologies (Office365, Linkedin, IoT, bots) to enable customers to make smarter decisions, redesign business processes faster, and fuel business growth.

Customers in all industries increasingly rely on Dynamics based solutions to create differentiating digital capabilities for a variety of scenario’s like Sales, Marketing, Operations, Field Service, Customer Service, Finance, Talent and Project Service Automation.

I am responsible for the Enterprise market, the 600 biggest accounts in The Netherlands. Key activities within my role include:
- New business development (lead generation & qualification)
- Solution selling (vertical based, teaming up with the Solution Specialist Professional's)
- Partner engagement (SI's and ISV's with industry-specific differentiating proposition) 

Awards and achievements: 
+ Western Europe FY18 Champion Award, Compete with Growth Mindset, achieved for implementing a Dynamics 365 new business development plan in which we leverage data-driven analysis, social selling and the scalability of our partner network
+ Local Star Award
+ Attainment 233%
profile_positions.title: New Business Development Lead within Enterprise segment - Business Applications (Dynamics 365)

profile_positions.description: The Microsoft Academy for College Hires (MACH) program is a customized learning experience designed for the newest university hires in various job families including Marketing, Sales, Services, IT and Operations. This two-year program complements a role by ensuring that you receive professional development to enable you to start strong, accelerate your impact, build your network and drive a long-term career at Microsoft. Microsoft does this by offering world-class training, coaching from some of the brightest minds in the industry and a global community of MACHs from more than 60 countries.
profile_positions.title: MACH Sales Traineeship (Microsoft Academy for College Hires)

profile_positions.description:
As Inside Sales in the Enterprise and Partner Group (EPG) for the Manufacturing Industry, my responsibilities consist of acting as the coordinating link between sales excellence, marketing, solution professionals and account team for the top 25 Manufacturing accounts in The Netherlands. I was responsible for the following products: Office 365, Enterprise Mobility and Security, Dynamics 365, Azure, Power BI.

Additional activities include:
- New business development (lead generation/qualification with BANT criteria)
- Social selling (to C-level)
- Customer planning
- Marketing integration
- Pipeline management
- Partner management (strengthen engagement with SI's and ISV's)

Awards and achievements: 
+ Top Talent Status, after my first year at Microsoft as a MACH trainee, with an inside sales role for the Enterprise Segment, I was rewarded by Senior Leadership Team with Top Talent Status. Achieved by reaching a new business record, and implementing a new marketing model.
+ Attainment 186%
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales - Enterprise & Partner Group (EPG)

profile_positions.description:
Technology has always inspired me to innovate and transform "old" business models. Together with a friend I founded an innovative start-up that provides multiple services through Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (drones), for example: aerial marketing and inspections. Especially within the real estate branch we had a solid footprint, by making attractive media from the sky, which people could use to sell their house.

In this role I was responsible for company strategy, new business development and sales.
profile_positions.title: Founder / Owner - SkyTech Innovations

profile_positions.description:
Sports and in particular soccer has always been a passion to me. In 2009 I was selected to play in the youth squad and after a few years I became member of the Dutch National Paralympic First Team. For this full-time practice, I received A-status from NOC*NSF.

2009: youth squad under 17
2010: youth squad under 19
2011-2012: A-squad 

Fulltime training program in Zeist and Papendal, attended international tournaments in: London (Olympic Park), Barcelona, Copenhagen, Kiev and Glasgow.
profile_positions.title: Dutch National CP Team - Professional soccer player (NOC*NSF A-status)

volunteer_experiences.description: Giving lectures about achieving diversity and inclusion within business environments.
